EmailTemplate.name: ATS Case transfer to Ground Support
EmailTemplate.subject: ATS Case transfer to Ground Support
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Thank you for your email requesting information about ground support equipment. To ensure your issue is resolved as quickly as possible, we have forwarded your information to our Ground support experts at aerogsesupport@honeywell.com. An expert from that team will contact you very soon to resolve your question.
For future ground support equipment questions, feel free to contact the team at aerogsesupport@honeywell.com directly. For other technical support requests, visit www.myaerospace.com.
Thank you for contacting Aerospace Technical Support
